categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Jind" was a clone commando and a member of Yayax Squad who was born on Kamino and trained by the Mandalorian Rav Bralor. He participated in the Battle of Coruscant and later defected from the GAR and traveled to Mandalore along with the rest of Yayax Squad. They stayed alternatively between Kal Skirata's bastion on Kyrimorut and Bralor's own farm. Free from their previous lives, Jind and the rest of his squad began learning how to farm.
